title: Add the location 0,0 to the Points of Interest
body:
> by 0x8cff6832174091dae86f0244e3fd92d4ced2fe07 (frami)

## Genesis Plaza

![Genesis Plaza](https://api.decentraland.org/v1/parcels/0/0/map.png)

Should the scene located at 0,0 be added to the Point of Interest list?

## Description

Why do you think that this location should be a featured point of interest within Decentraland? Please describe the scene located at these coordinates, explaining how it would be interesting or helpful for other Decentraland users.

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.io/en/proposal/?id=e0e88a00-be96-11eb-8f2a-59ea12bd43f1)**
author: 0x2Ba0352480bd1Ea073A83e6639b06362131894CE
